title: Samson Oil and Gas Limited – Request for Trading Halt
text:
DENVER & PERTH, Australia--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The following is a letter issued by Denis Rakich, Director/Company Secretary of Samson Oil and Gas Limited (ASX: SSN; OTC: SSNYY):
12 April 2018
Mr Wade Baggott
ASX Compliance Pty Ltd
Level 40, Central Park
152-158 St Georges Terrace
Perth WA 6000
Via email - TradingHaltsPerth@asx.com.au
Dear Mr Baggott
Pursuant to Listing Rule 17.1 Samson Oil and Gas Limited (Company) requests an immediate trading halt to be granted in relation to the Company’s securities (ASX code : SSN ), I advise that:
The trading halt is necessary for the Company to make an announcement to the market regarding a funding proposal The trading halt is requested until the earlier of 8.00am AWST on Monday 16 April 2018 and the release of an announcement to the market regarding a funding proposal The Company is not aware of any reason why a trading halt should not be granted or of any other information necessary to inform the market about the trading halt.
Yours faithfully
SAMSON OIL AND GAS LIMITED
DENIS RAKICH
Director/ Company Secretary
